lender.name: Don

lender.occupational_info: We are awesome!

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: People have encouraged and supported me when I needed it.

lender.name: MalNicole
lender.loan_because: I care about helping people reach their goals and believe support should be available to anyone, no matter who they are.

lender.name: The Lawrences
lender.loan_because: ..."Whatever you have done for the least of these, you have done unto me." - Matthew 25:40

lender.name: Robert
lender.occupational_info: I try to understand what makes clouds and rain and how the sunshine flows.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand up at some point - I am blessed to live in a country that has opportunities available. I want to share this with others.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites.

lender.name: capra
lender.loan_because:
I'm a godless liberal with a bleeding heart. My only regret is that I have but one paycheck to give to my world.
Actually I have more than one paycheck, because I'm a freelancer and I really dig the idea of streams of income. I donate 10% of everything I make every month to give back that which I have gotten.
lender.occupational_info: I draw, design, code websites, crochet, and lots of other things like making fiber spinning tools and gadgets.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: Capitalism isn't perfect, sometimes it needs some help.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: everyone needs help at some stage or stages in their lives to try new things and set up a decent life for themselves and those they care about.
lender.occupational_info: I write a regular blog about my life (www.blurbfromtheburbs.blogspot.com) that shows all my failings, oddities and (hopefully) amusing conclusions. I also wrote a book, 'Work/Life Balance for Dummies' (Australia, UK and Germany) and continue that theme by writing articles for the Age and Sydney Morning Herald newspapers. I also love doing book reviews for The Big Issue Magazine (Australia) and other publications - free books is a writer's dream. Finally, I do chocolate reviews for GoneChocco (www.gonechocco.com) because Aussies know that chocolate's not just for breakfast any more. In short, I try to say 'yes' to any opportunity that comes my way, and have recently received a grant to tackle the litter issue in my area and to develop some 'heritage walk' maps that celebrate the history and cultural diversity of my beloved neighbourhood.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It's a practical way of showing God's love for people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a hospital chaplain and a minister of the Gospel of Jesus Christ. I visit with sick people and pray for them and I teach people about God's message of grace and forgiveness found in the Bible.

lender.name: Gregg
lender.loan_because: I believe the money I loan makes a difference in the world. I am confident that loaning my money through Kiva is one of the best ways to fight poverty and help rid of it.

lender.name: Giovanni
lender.loan_because: it's fun to help.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: $25 will either buy me a couple beers, or help fund global economic development. So basically, I loan to protect my liver.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: Alone, I started my own business. I had the physical and financial help of my family. I'm thankful for that every day. I want to make it possible for others to achieve self-reliance.
lender.occupational_info: I bathe and cut the hair on pet dogs. I use special shampoos and conditioners according to the specific skin and hair needs of the individual dogs. Even giving them blueberry facials. (very American) Some of my clients come in every three weeks.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to have had the opportunities that I have had and I'm glad to have the chance to provide opportunities to others.

lender.name: Vladislav

lender.occupational_info: I love to show a kids a beautiful world. World of Freedom and Liability.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I want to give a chance to people. That's all people need.. a chance
lender.occupational_info: I study most of the time and write. My dream is to become an actor/mime and a writer.

lender.name: jenny
lender.loan_because: This is the easiest thing to do and it is so precise that you can actually identify with the person you are lending to and hopefully see a result in their life. I love that you can choose from all the details given. It is a wonderfully interactive site and they did a great job with it. Also I love stuff you should know. The guys are excellent, topics really interesting and it is 30 of the most enjoyable minutes of my day ( on my way to and from work)
lender.occupational_info: I review contracts for a company that finds people work.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.occupational_info: I support women with mental health problems reconnect into the community and to support them in attaining and sustaining independent living.

lender.name: Mollie
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have barriers to employment because of disability and/or injury. I provide assistance with accessing medical care and vocational rehabilitation services to return them to gainful employment.

lender.occupational_info: I make sure that the medical machine that my company makes is safe and can be used by people from all around the world.

lender.occupation: Professional Link Building and SEO Company
lender.occupational_info: Jarrah Robertson is a professional Internet Marketing consultant servicing large enterprises, website owners, and proudly supporting small business owners generate more leads online. Jarrah is the proud owner of several websites including a professional Internet Marketing company (www.SmartMediaInnovations.com) and specializes in Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Pay Per Click Marketing, and a plethora of "white (and black) hat" Internet Marketing tactics for driving large amounts of traffic to any product, website, or service. I highly recommend Jarrah Robertson as your next Internet marketing consultant. ~ David Baxter, NSW, Australia.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.occupational_info:
Lorna Li's Biography
Lorna Li is an online marketer with a passion for helping green businesses, nonprofits, and social entrepreneurs with social media marketing.
In a previous life before online marketing, Lorna spent 10 years in the nonprofit sector working on programs involving indigenous cultural preservation, environmental sustainability, and social entrepreneurship. Since nonprofits and social entrepreneurs usually have limited resources, Lorna is a pro with marketing on a shoestring budget.
Lorna likes to assist nonprofits, green companies and social activists with planning their social media strategy. Lorna can often be seen at Bay Area tech events, eco-conscious festivals, or in the Amazon Rainforest.
Green Marketing for Nonprofits, Green Entrepreneurs, and Social Entrepreneurs
Lorna Li blogs at Green Marketing 2.0, her personal blog created to help entrepreneurs, activists, and nonprofits use web based tools to raise awareness of and build community around their worthy causes. She is also is the founder of Green Marketing TV a blog that features videos, news, tutorials, and information intended to inspiring entrepreneurs to join in the green economy. Green marketing generally refers to 2 things 1) the marketing of products and services that are environmentally amicable 2) marketing that is supprotable ie. uses recycled paper, soy based inks, green web hosting, etc. Because green marketing can be so generally interpreted, Green Marketing TV will look at all points of green marketing, from green business marketing to environmental marketing to social cause marketing.
Connect with Lorna Li
Feel free to connect with Lorna Li on Twitter, Facebook, YouTube or LinkedIn, or subscribe to Lorna Li's Friendfeed
Hobbies / Interests environmental sustainability, green building, green business, green economy, green marketing, green tech, social entrepreneurs, nonprofits, online marketing, ppc, search engine marketing, seo, sem, social media, travel, yoga

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: My father Paul passed away recently and was a very generous caring person and I do this as a way to honor him.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an airline analyst.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I believe people are good, and need opportunities for meaningful work, education, and community. a little money to get things going is a small but important contribution to making these opportunities available.
lender.occupational_info: I am a feminist. My work is focused on understanding male violence against women and doing all I can, with other women and with pro-feminist men, to end it. specifically, i aim to interfere with and resist the demand for women in prostitution, and to get women out of prostitution.

lender.name: vlad008
lender.loan_because: I feel that it's right.

lender.name: Bengt & Shani

lender.occupational_info: Bengt Olav works as an IT consultant, while Shani is studying Food Science at the university.

lender.name: hauntedcuriosities.com

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: a friend once said that they wished Bill Gates would give them $10,000 - he wouldn't notice that amount and it would totally change her life. Kiva allows ME to be Bill Gates.

lender.loan_because: Malt-O-Meal Co. is family owned. Committed to using sustainable methods of production, providing packaging that creates less consumer waste & giving back the community are all part of saving families money. Malt-O-Meal is a great place to do great work.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to several third world countries during my work and have seen how money injected directly into the local economy, circumventing the large international monetary institutions, dramatically helps the people who need that money the most.
lender.occupational_info: I study the remnants of ancient cultures, everything from pyramids to clay pots.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and want to share with others.

lender.name: al r.
lender.loan_because: It helps people lift themselves up in the world.

lender.name: Michael & Jason
lender.loan_because: We loan because people in our lives believed in us and gave us a helping hand and this is a way to spread the love. We feel that the most important thing in life is to love and help our fellow man. Kiva is a great way of helping people all over the world achieve their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: Michael is a medical transcriptionist who types reports for patient visits to doctors offices and hospitals. Jason is a master mechanic who works on large diesel trucks that haul fuel and supplies across the country.

lender.name: John M
lender.loan_because: I consider this a great opportunity to help people who are less fortunate and genuinely want to help themselves and their family. It's a sustainable and dignified way of giving people the break that they need to do just that.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company's business partners to market and sell our products to customers. In my spare time, I help teach small business owners in the community to grow their business by marketing their products/services more effectively.

lender.name: Shadlyn
lender.loan_because: I can. I think it's important to help improve the world in as many little ways as possible. For me, this is a little way that may make a big difference to others.
lender.occupational_info: I handle paperwork and answer phones for a company that does roofing.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: It is something I can do to give others a leg up in life. I have been helped along my way many times and I'd like to pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a physician.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe that the wealthy nations should not increase their riches by ensuring that a percentage of the world remains poor, so I'm doing my bit to restore the balance.

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I work in an industry that is all about recreation and spending time outdoors enjoying life. Billions of people do not have the luxury that myself and my customers have, and there is no reason that I should be able to enjoy that lifestyle while they struggle out of poverty. I want to do what I can to alleviate this situation.
lender.occupational_info: I sell people recreational equipment. Backpacks, tents, bikes, boats, etc. I help people be comfortable and have a good time when they spend time outdoors.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in the dreamer, the inventor,the creative mind that will not go by the book.
lender.occupational_info: My business is making business. Advertising, marketing.

lender.occupational_info: i am programmer, i work with software open source

lender.name: Bruce

lender.occupational_info: My wife works, and I stay home with the kids. I am disabled. I use this image to identify myself because I wear an eye-patch.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: there are always people in this world who are less fortunate than me. Give poor people food, change their life for a day... Give them a way of life? Change their lives forever.

lender.name: Bob & Lynn
lender.loan_because: We want to make an impact in Christ's name.

lender.name: Kimberly

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepeneur myself and want other people to have this chance too!
lender.occupational_info: I do a lot of different things: I'm a coach, trainer, teacher. I make video's, I'm a fotographer and webdesigner. Love all my jobs!

lender.name: Sebastian
lender.loan_because: I want to empower ambitious people to support their local community.

lender.name: Robin
lender.occupational_info: I teach English at a university in Turkey.

lender.name: John & Laura
lender.loan_because: The people move us. Their stories are amazing.
lender.occupational_info: We live and teach in Eastern Europe. Love it! Wouldn't trade it . . . the lessons we've learned are invaluable.

lender.name: Mickey
lender.loan_because: We all want our dreams to come true!

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: Im a giving person and love helping people, and think that everyone should do at least one thing in their life time to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Answer customer e-mails and calls with any questions or queries or any changes they the customers wish's to make. Also to help customers who may be having problems completing a booking.

lender.name: Guido
lender.loan_because: I always thought a method to give not the fish, but the fish pole to do it by yourself

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: Its a good cause

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: People think Americans are greedy and heartless. Their governments and clergy tell them these lies for political purposes so that they will hate us. The truth must be made clear, and actions speak louder than words.

lender.name: Rosey
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Uber housewife, retired from the brokerage industry. Baking, gardening and knitting have helped me find my center.

lender.name: Brittany
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: alchemyiam
lender.loan_because:
I lend because: Well, because I can :-) This world belongs to all of us. So let's share it.
I know that small loans help not only the recipient, but also the folk around them. By helping people become self-sufficient, this in turn lifts up their whole community.
lender.occupational_info: I'm simple person who loves arts, music and books. I like to communicate with people from all over the world and to discuss the big questions of our time with them. You know, like the weather or what's on TV. ;-) So feel free to contact me if you like.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Every little helps!

lender.name: *kruemel*
lender.loan_because: When I was in Ghana in 2008 (as a volunteer) I`ve seen so many poverty everywhere. I gave many donations to the orphonage I was working, to restore the building and to buy things like cloths, cosmetics and food. I know I could help the children and could make them a bit more happy. I want to help and that`s why I approve these kind of loans.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.occupational_info: I design DIY mural kits for children's rooms. My designs allow people with no artistic skills to decorate their child's room themself using a simple paint by number system.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I recently became aware of microfinance through a course I am taking, Social Entrepreneurship. The mission is one that I believe in. I believe that every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior economics major at The University of the South.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.occupational_info: Sustainable Landscape Design and Construction

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Eric Gozlan is President and CEO of Gold Rush Entertainment. Eric Gozlan is a movie producer and financier with over 13 years experience in business development and venture capital.
lender.occupational_info: Eric Gozlan is President and CEO of Gold Rush Entertainment. Eric Gozlan is a movie producer and financier with over 13 years experience in business development and venture capital.

lender.name: Allie
lender.loan_because: i want to help women around the world and promote positive and sustainable living
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company and I insure the directors and officers of large public and private companies.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Transfusion Lab at the local hospital. This means whenever someone comes into the hospital and needs blood, I am the one who gets it ready for donation. It is very nice to know that I have helped save a life.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed because I have enough to provide for my family and a little extra to loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a computer in the office of a large company. I make sure that products and their transportation are priced correctly.

lender.name: Axel
lender.loan_because: I believe cooperation is better than aid

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women and farmers by helping them create a successful business.
